result.title: Prayer Before Meal
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيْمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
result.latin: Alloohumma barik lanaa fiimaa razatanaa waqinaa 'adzaa bannar
result.translation: O Allah, bless us with what You have provided for us and save us from the punishment of the Fire

result.title: Prayer After Meal
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِيْنَ
result.latin: Alhamdu lillaahil ladzii ath'amanaa wa saqoonaa wa ja'alnaa muslimiin
result.translation: Praise be to God who fed us and gave us drink and made us Muslims.

result.title: Prayer After Drinking
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ جَعَلَهُ عَذْبًا فُرَاتًا بِرَحْمَتِهِ وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْهُ مِلْحًا اُجَاجًا بِذُنُوْبِنَا
result.latin: Alhamdu lillaahil ladzi ja'alahuu 'adzbam furootam birohmatihii wa lamyaj'alhu milhan ujaajam bidzunuubinaa
result.translation: Praise be to God, who made it sweet and furious with His mercy, and did not make it salty, arguing with our sins.

result.title: Prayer When Eating Forgot to Read Prayer
result.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ فِىِ أَوَّلِهِ وَآخِرِهِ
result.latin: Bismillaahi fii awwalihi wa aakhirihi
result.translation: In the name of God at the beginning and the end

result.title: Prayer Before Bed
result.arabic: بِسْمِكَ اللّٰهُمَّ اَحْيَا وَاَمُوْتُ
result.latin: Bismikallohumma ahya wa amuutu
result.translation: In the name of God, I live and die

result.title: Prayer When a Nightmare
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنّىِ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَمَلِ الشَّيْطَانِ وَسَيِّئاَتِ اْلأَحْلاَمِ
result.latin: Allaahumma innii a'uudzubika min 'amalisy syaithaani wa sayyiaatil ahlami
result.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the work of Satan and from bad dreams.

result.title: Prayer When Getting Good Dreams
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِيْ قَطْلَ الْحَاجَتِ
result.latin: Alhamdulillahil ladzii qodzoo haajaati
result.translation: Praise be to God who fulfilled the need.

result.title: Wake Up Prayer
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَحْيَانَا بَعْدَمَآ اَمَاتَنَا وَاِلَيْهِ النُّشُوْرُ
result.latin: Alhamdu lillahil ladzii ahyaanaa ba'da maa amaa tanaa wa ilahin nusyuuru
result.translation: Praise be to God, who at times after we have died, and to Him is the resurrection.

result.title: Prayer to enter the bathroom or toilet
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنّىْ اَعُوْذُبِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَآئِثِ
result.latin: Alloohumma Innii a'uudzubika minal khubutsi wal khoaaitsi
result.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from wickedness and wickedness

result.title: Istinja Prayer
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ حَسِّنْ فَرْجِىْ مِنَ الْفَوَاخِشِ وَظَهِّرْ قَلْبِيْ مِنَ النِّفَاقِ
result.latin: Alloohumma thahhir qolbii minan nifaaqi wa hashshin fajrii minal fawaahisyi
result.translation: Oh God, improve my chastity from immorality and guard my heart from hypocrisy

result.title: Prayer Exit Bathroom Or Toilet
result.arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ الْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَذْهَبَ عَنّى اْلاَذَى وَعَافَانِىْ
result.latin: Ghufraanaka. Alhamdulillaahil ladzii adzhaba ‘annjil adzaa wa’aafaanii
result.translation: Your forgiveness, praise be to God who removed my harm and healed me

result.title: Prayer Before Fajr Prayer
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ ضِيْقِ الدُّنْيَا وَضِيْقِ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
result.latin: Alloohumma inni a'udzubika min dzhiiqid-dunyaa wa dzhiiqi yaumal-qiyaamati
result.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the distress of this world and the distress of the Day of Resurrection.

result.title: Morning Prayer
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ بِكَ اَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ اَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ النُّشُوْرُ
result.latin: Alloohumma bika ashbahnaa wa bika amsainaa wa bika nahyaa wa bika namuutu wa ilaikan nusyuuru
result.translation: Oh God, with you we have become, and with you we have become, and with you we live, and with you we die, and to you is the resurrection.

result.title: Prayer Welcoming the Afternoon
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ بِكَ اَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ اَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيْرُ
result.latin: Alloohumma bika amsainaa wa bika ashbahnaa wa bika nahyaa wa bika namuutu wa ilaikal mashiir
result.translation: Ya Allah, with you we have become, and with you we have become, and with you we live, and with you we die, and to you is the destiny

result.title: Prayer When Reflecting
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِىْ  فَحَسِّـنْ خُلُقِىْ
result.latin: Alhamdulillaahi kamaa hassanta kholqii fahassin khuluqii
result.translation: Praise be to God, as you have improved my morals, so have my morals improved.

result.title: Home Entrance Prayer
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنّىْ اَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَالْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَالْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللهِ رَبّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
result.latin: Allahumma innii as-aluka khoirol mauliji wa khoirol makhroji bismillaahi wa lajnaa wa bismillaahi khorojnaa wa'alallohi robbina tawakkalnaa
result.translation: Ya Allah, I ask you for the best way out and the best way out. In the name of God we entered and in the name of God we left, and in God our Lord we trust

result.title: Prayers Leaving Home / Prayers Traveling
result.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ لاَحَوْلَ وَلاَقُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِالله
result.latin: Bismillaahi tawakkaltu 'alalloohi laa hawlaa walaa quwwata illaa bilaahi
result.translation: In the name of God, I put my trust in God

result.title: Prayer Wearing Clothes
result.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَاهُوَ لَهُ وَاَعُوْذُبِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّمَا هُوَلَهُ
result.latin: Bismillaahi, Alloohumma innii as-aluka min khoirihi wa khoiri maa huwa lahuu wa'a'uu dzubika min syarrihi wa syarri maa huwa lahuu
result.translation: In the name of God, O God, I ask you for its good and the good of what is for it, and I seek refuge in you from its evil and its horrendous

result.title: Prayer to Wear New Clothes
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ كَسَانِىْ هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيْهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّىْ وَلاَقُوَّةٍ
result.latin: Alhamdu lillaahil ladzii kasaanii haadzaa wa rozaqoniihi min ghoiri hawlim minni wa laa quwwatin
result.translation: Praise be to God who clothed me with this and provided me with it without any power or strength from me.

result.title: Prayer of Undressing
result.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِيْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
result.latin: Bismillaahil ladzii laa ilaaha illaa huwa
result.translation: In the name of God, besides whom there is no god

result.title: Prayer Asking for Useful Knowledge
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
result.latin: Alloohumma innii as-aluka 'ilmaan naafi'aan wa rizqoon thoyyibaan wa 'amalaan mutaqobbalaan
result.translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, and they had a good, and pursuant receptive

result.title: Prayer Before Studying
result.arabic: يَارَبِّ زِدْنِىْ عِلْمًا وَارْزُقْنِىْ فَهْمًا
result.latin: Yaa robbi zidnii 'ilman warzuqnii fahmaa
result.translation: O Lord, increase my knowledge and grant me understanding

result.title: Prayer After Study
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اِسْتَوْدِعُكَ مَاعَلَّمْتَنِيْهِ فَارْدُدْهُ اِلَىَّ عِنْدَ حَاجَتِىْ وَلاَ تَنْسَنِيْهِ يَارَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ
result.latin: Allaahumma innii astaudi'uka maa 'allamtaniihi fardud-hu ilayya 'inda haajatii wa laa tansaniihi yaa robbal 'alamiin
result.translation: O Allah, I entrust to You what You taught me, so return it to me when I need it, and do not forget it, O Lord of the worlds.

result.title: Travel Prayer
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ هَوِّنْ عَلَيْنَا سَفَرَنَا هَذَا وَاطْوِعَنَّابُعْدَهُ اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ الصَّاحِبُ فِى السَّفَرِوَالْخَلِيْفَةُفِى الْاَهْلِ
result.latin: Alloohumma hawwin 'alainaa safaranaa hadzaa waatwi 'annaa bu'dahu. Alloohumma antashookhibu fiissafari walkholiifatu fiil ahli
result.translation: Oh God, make this journey easy for us, and make it easy for us to keep it away.

result.title: Vehicle Ride Prayer
result.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِىْ سَخَّرَلَنَا هَذَا وَمَاكُنَّالَهُ مُقْرِنِيْنَ وَاِنَّآ اِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُوْنَ
result.latin: Subhaanalladzii sakkhara lanaa hadza wama kunna lahu muqriniin wa-inna ilaa rabbina lamunqalibuun.
result.translation: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we have not been able to unite it, and to our Lord we shall return.

result.title: Boat Boarding Prayer
result.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ مَجْرَهَا وَمُرْسَهَآاِنَّ رَبِّىْ لَغَفُوْرٌرَّحِيْمٌ
result.latin: Bismillaahi majrahaa wa mursaahaa inna robbii laghofuurur rohiim
result.translation: In the name of God, its course and anchorage. My Lord is Forgiving, Merciful.

result.title: Prayer When Arriving at the Destination
result.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِى سَلَمَنِى وَالَّذِى اَوَنِى وَالَّذِى جَمَعَ الشَّمْلَ بِ
result.latin: Alhamdulillahil ladzi sallamani wal ladzi awani wal ladzi jama’asy syamla bi
result.translation: Praise be to God who delivered me, who brought me together, and who reunited me with

result.title: Prayer When Going to the Mosque
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِىْ قَلْبِى نُوْرًا وَفِى لِسَانِىْ نُوْرًا وَفِىْ بَصَرِىْ نُوْرًا وَفِىْ سَمْعِىْ نُوْرًا وَعَنْ يَسَارِىْ نُوْرًا وَعَنْ يَمِيْنِىْ نُوْرًا وَفَوْقِىْ نُوْرًا وَتَحْتِىْ نُوْرًا وَاَمَامِىْ نُوْرًا وَخَلْفِىْ نُوْرًا وَاجْعَلْ لِّىْ نُوْرًا
result.latin: Alloohummaj-'al fii qolbhii nuuroon wa fii lisaanii nuuroon wa fii bashorii nuuroon wa fii sam'ii nuuroon wa'an yamiinii nuuroon wa'an yasaarii nuuroon wa fauqii nuuroo wa tahtii nuuroo wa amaamii nuuroon wa khofii nuuroon waj-'al lii nuuroon
result.translation: O Allah, place light in my heart, light in my tongue, light in my sight, light in my hearing, light on my left, light on my right, and light on my right. Cover me with light, and under me is light, and in front of me is light, behind me is light, and make light for me

result.title: Prayer Entering the Mosque
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِيْ اَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
result.latin: Allahummaf tahlii abwaaba rohmatik
result.translation: O Allah, open the doors of your mercy for me

result.title: Prayer Exit the Mosque
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّى اَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
result.latin: Allahumma innii asaluka min fadlik
result.translation: Oh God, I ask you please

result.title: Prayer Will Read the Qur'an
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ افْتَحْ عَلَىَّ حِكْمَتَكَ وَانْشُرْ عَلَىَّ رَحْمَتَكَ وَذَكِّرْنِىْ مَانَسِيْتُ يَاذَاالْجَلاَلِ وَاْلاِكْرَامِ
result.latin: Alloohummaftah 'alayya hikmataka wansyur 'alayya rohmataka wa dzakkirnii maanasiitu yaa dzal jalaali wal ikhroomi
result.translation: O Allah, open to your wisdom and spread to your mercy and remind me of what I have forgotten, O Majesty and Honor

result.title: Prayer After Reading the Qur'an
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ ارْحَمْنِىْ بِالْقُرْآنِ. وَاجْعَلْهُ لِىْ اِمَامًا وَنُوْرًا وَّهُدًى وَّرَحْمَةً. اَللّٰهُمَّ ذَكِّرْنِىْ مِنْهُ مَانَسِيْتُ وَعَلِّمْنِىْ مِنْهُ مَاجَهِلْتُ. وَارْزُقْنِىْ تِلاَ وَتَهُ آنَآءَ اللَّيْلِ وَاَطْرَافَ النَّهَارٍ. وَاجْعَلْهُ لِىْ حُجَّةً يَارَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ
result.latin: Allahummarhamnii bil qur'aani. waj'alhu lii imaaman wa nuuran wa hudan wa rohman. Allahumma dzakkirnii minhu maa nasiitu wa'allimnii minhu maa jahiltu. wazuqnii tilaa watahu aanaa-al laili wa athroofan nahaari. waj'alhu lii hujjatan yaa robbal 'aalamiina.
result.translation: Oh God, have mercy on me with the Qur'an. And make him an imam, a light, a guidance, and a mercy for me. Oh God, remind me of it that I forgot and teach me of it that I did not know. And provide me with recitation and recitation during the hours of the night and the ends of the day. And make it a proof for me, O Lord of the worlds.

result.title: Prayer of Wudhu intention
result.arabic: نَوَيْتُ الْوُضُوْءَ لِرَفْعِ الْحَدَثِ اْلاَصْغَرِ فَرْضًا لِلّٰهِ تَعَالَى
result.latin: Nawaitul whudu-a lirof'il hadatsii ashghori fardhon lillaahi ta'aalaa
result.translation: I intended to perform ablution to remove minor ritual impurity for God Almighty

result.title: Prayer After Ablution
result.arabic: اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لاَّاِلَهَ اِلاَّاللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَشَرِيْكَ لَهُ وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّ مُحَمَّدًاعَبْدُهُ وَرَسُوْلُهُ. اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِىْ مِنَ التَّوَّابِيْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِىْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِيْنَ، وَجْعَلْنِيْ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِيْنَ
result.latin: Asyhadu allaa ilaaha illalloohu wahdahuu laa syariika lahu wa asyhadu anna muhammadan ‘abduhuuwa rosuuluhuu, alloohummaj’alnii minat tawwaabiina waj’alnii minal mutathohhiriina, waj'alnii min 'ibadikash shaalihiina
result.translation: I bear witness that there is no god but Allah, alone, with no partner, and that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger. Oh God, make me one of those who repent, and make me one of those who purify themselves, and make me one of your righteous servants.

result.title: Prayer for Bathing
result.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْلِى ذَنْبِى وَوَسِّعْ لِى فِىْ دَارِىْ وَبَارِكْ لِىْ فِىْ رِزْقِىْ
result.latin: Alloohummaghfirlii dzambii wa wassi'lii fii daarii wa baarik lii fii rizqii
result.translation: O Allah, forgive my sin, expand my home for me, and bless my sustenance.
